channel.title: EEZ on Masumbuko Semba's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in EEZ on Masumbuko Semba's Blog

item.title: Kernel smoothing of Spatial Data
item.description: Kernel density estimation is a popular tool for visualizing the distribution of data. In this post, we are going to look on how to create smoothed map of random points. We will use a shapefile dataset that contains potential fishing zones derived from sea surface temperature recorded between January and June 2020 in Pemba channel. You can simply download the file from this link. Once you have downloaded the file, unzip and browse in the uncompressed file you find the shapefile pfz.
